subtitle: The sweetcorn is boiled then cooked on the barbecue for a lovely chargrilled flavour.

method.text: Bring a large pan of water to the boil. Add the sweetcorn, return to the boil and cook for 10-15 min until tender. Drain thoroughly.
Place on preheated barbecue for 15 min, turning and basting frequently until piping hot and brown. Serve immediately.

title: Barbecued sweetcorn
